commit message:
Add changelog files

Signed-off-by: Jorge Ruesga <jorge@ruesga.com>

Fix a small glitch in the card image

Signed-off-by: Jorge Ruesga <jorge@ruesga.com>

Increase time of animation for a better look in screen

Signed-off-by: Jorge Ruesga <jorge@ruesga.com>

Fix hardware acceleration problem and improve responsiveness

* Change to software acceleration when no animation is required and
remove
drawing cache (fix opengl error for reach max texture size)
* Improve responsiveness of choose albums activity

Signed-off-by: Jorge Ruesga <jorge@ruesga.com>
